bill_title: authorize school district boards to provide licensed day care facilities on or off school district property.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize school district boards to provide licensed day care facilities on or off school district property. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Any school may provide day care services licensed pursuant to chapter 26-6 on or off the premises of a school district and may charge a fee therefor. The day care facility may provide services to students, employees of the school district, and area residents if no other licensed day care facilities are available. The school board shall conduct a hearing concerning a proposed day care center to be provided by the school district. The business manager of the school district shall publish in the official newspaper notices of a hearing once each week for two consecutive weeks with the first publication not less than ten days before the hearing. The notice shall state the date, location, and purpose of the hearing. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
